EmailTemplate.description: Invite for SCC NCR Teamworks tradeshow
EmailTemplate.name: Teamworks Evite 2010
EmailTemplate.subject: Visit Univar at SCC TEAMWORKS 2010
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Visit Univar at SCC TEAMWORKS 2010
Univar Personal Care Ingredients invites you to visit Booth 211 & 213 @ TEAMWORKS 2010 Donald E. Stephens Convention Center Rosemont, IL. March 31, 2010
9:00 AM - Noon Educational Session Noon - 6:00 PM Tradeshow Exhibits
The following specialty ingredient suppliers will be displaying with Univar at our booth:
BASF CP Kelco Dow Corning Dupont
Univar will also have information on ingredients from other key specialty industry partners.
Be sure to stop by our booth to learn about our newest ingredients, and to enter our drawing for a Spa Gift Certificate!
Resources ------------------------------- About the Event | http://www.midwestscc.org/teamworks/#about Register for the Event | http://www.midwestscc.org/teamworks/#register
